website_summaries.verdict: Costs a little more than some other beginner sets, but offers a full set of irons and one hybrid.
pros: Set has a driver, a fairway wood, a hybrid wood, 7-irons, one putter, headcovers, and a bag
Delivers a nice set of clubs for those who have played a little bit and are ready to own some new clubs
Perfect length for average height men
All clubs have a lightweight feel for easy swings
cons: Durability of the clubs and bag is questionable

customer_reviews.title: Great high handicap set
customer_reviews.text: I've used this set lightly for the past 6 years or so and I love these clubs. The irons hit straight and have good loft. I recently started golfing more and bought a very good used set of Callaway X18 irons and I like the Pre set more! The bag is fine but not great. The putter is great too, seems weighted nicely for my swing.
customer_reviews.author: Rolstonian

customer_reviews.title: Clone clubs, chipped paint, broken 3 hybrid after 36 holes
customer_reviews.text: Update after 36 hols of golf. The head of the 3 hybrid broke off at ball contact. Nobody I was golfing with has ever seen that happend before. Was excited to get the clubs and start hitting. They have been good so far for 2 trips to the driving range. I noticed that after 2 times the drivers pain is already chipping away. I can't give a good review based on that fact alone.
customer_reviews.author: Moore0517

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set but..
customer_reviews.text: Good starter set for my young teen. Really liked them at first but today, after using the clubs for maybe the 5th time, the driver head fell right off!! Reached out to the company and they put a new driver in the mail. Great customer service. However, the next day, the head flew off the 3 wood. This occurred at the driving range with a professional instructor there, so you know he wasn't abusing the clubs. And, he only weighs 125 pounds, so it's not like he is too strong for typical clubs. I don't get it. Now I'll be asking for a full refund. I am hoping they will stand by the 1 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: TFried

customer_reviews.title: These are great golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: These are great golf clubs. They are a Taylor made knock off which is really fine by me as I am just an amateur golfer. The clubs are sturdy, weight is nice, and fit me well (I am 5'9) The bag would be the worst out of it all, pretty cheap and the colours are a little funny. But really that is not an issue at all. I've used them many times at the driving range and have gone to the course at least 10 times now with them. I would recommend them for people looking to get a good starter set and not pay the crazy amounts for callaways, or taylor made.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: This was my first set and I loved it! Looks sharp and plays well. Really love the grip style on the putter. I found myself outgrowing the driver quickly but it gets the job done for the price! Just keep in mind this set does not include any wedges for shorter distances than the pitching wedge. So if you are looking for a starter set this is a great place to start!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the Price...cant go wrong for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first set of new golf club...im still a beginner and these are perfect for me. I play with guys that have Callaway's, Pings and Taylor made and i can keep my own with these. They are not going to make you a pro but they are a good set for the price you are getting them for! I'll keep these for 2yrs or so and then upgrade eventually....but for now these work just fine!
customer_reviews.author: dj2489

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I am the weekend golfer (when my wife lets me). I wasn't looking to spend millions on a set of clubs. These have been surprisingly good though. The bag wasn't the greatest and got replaced after 6 months (and again, only a weekened golfer - so bag really sucked). But the clubs are doing the job and getting me out of the house!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: First time golfer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some clubs to get into golfing but didnt want to spend a fortune and find out that I did not like it. But so far these clubs have been perfect havent had any trouble with the bag at all but i dont lug it around that much either. My only problem is the pitching wedge was a little short for a 6 foot man.I was told it should be about 2-3 inches taller. But I would recomend it to anyone just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: 6 weeks of light play, Driver broke.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad beginner set of clubs. I’ve been playing 18 holes, once a week for the last month. Today on the 1st hole the driver broke. Kind of disappointed in the quality as I was hoping they’d last a season at least. The bag is alright, the irons are good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. My game improved greatly. Perfect fit for my game
customer_reviews.author: Scott L.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy beginner
customer_reviews.text: With practice I will work up from a terrible golfer to a bad golfer. For me these are great. Over sized sweet spot to help me out, I wanted to learn with irons not a lot of fairway woods. I really enjoy the putter, it has improved short and long puts a lot. While some have had problems with the bag, mine is great and I've had not issues.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini 88

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Good set for the price. I've been getting into golf and decided to buy a set rather than borrowing my dad's spare set. The driver and fairway wood are designed for beginners with slower swing speeds. I have a faster swing and ended up getting an extra stiff driver because this driver would lag behind my swing by several inches. Irons are okay. Putter is decent and the bag is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Spaghetti25

customer_reviews.title: Logo seems to be a knock off of a major brand (one of the other golfers mentioned)
customer_reviews.text: First Impressions: Pretty looking set The Good: As someone new to the game I feel that it's a great set-- I'm a tall 6`2 male though and I feel these clubs may be too short for me- The Bad: See the Good Would I purchase this item again: Yes, A good starter set at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Dee Z Nats

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Two of the heads on the drivers broke within the first month and then the stand for the bag broke recently. The clubs were good for a beginner, but the heads broke hitting off grass with little force.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: A good place to start
customer_reviews.text: These are by no means premium clubs, but I supposed that's implicit based on the price point. They do however offer an individual who is completely bereft of experience an inexpensive crash course in the game. I recommend purchasing the clubs only if they are your first set. They were mine... and they served me well.
customer_reviews.author: shaun sandera

customer_reviews.title: Good clubs inspect them before use though
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of clubs I've used them about 5 times now everything seems good still. The only problem is in the driver has a loose piece inside of it and every time u move the head it rattles. It still works good just really annoying and I didn't have time to deal with customer service to get them replaced before my outing so eventually il get a new driver
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Golf Cubs
customer_reviews.text: Real nice clubs. Plan on getting good with them. Excellent for learning the game.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs, Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase. Has a wide range of clubs to get me started, haven't had any issues with any clubs after going thru about 1500 balls at the range. Bag is comfortable, haven't had any issues with the stand or the strap. My friends who are avid golfers praise my clubs so that counts for something in my book. Would deff recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY PINEMEADOWS
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these clubs. Great for a beginner. The driver is a little clunky but who cares? This is an amazing set for any beginning golfer or someone who doesn't take the game too serious.
customer_reviews.author: JosiahRyan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these clubs as a first time golfer. We've taken them to the driving range and used them once on a 9 whole course. So far, they've been great. I recommend them for anyone just starting to play golf and wants a decent set. We live in FL so hopefully they will come in handy often. The bag is well made and sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea T.

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these clubs for a family game and I golf a couple times a year, I saw these clubs and they were a great deal so I bought them. While I was waiting for them to arrive I thought about buying more expensive clubs from a store. I am a pretty good golfer not the best, when I got them delivered I was very happy I didn't buy any other clubs. These are not cheap clubs by any means and I did very well with them on the course. I have added a driver to my set that hits much better then the 1 it comes with but all in all very good set.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: I play golf every so often with my in-laws and just got plain tired of sharing clubs. This is definitely a great starter set. I was sharing high end titleist clubs prior to buying this set and I have to say as an extreme beginner, I didn't notice too much difference with the exception of the driver. The driver just didn't feel weighted evenly so I would recommend investing in a decent driver but never-the-less, still an awesome beginner set.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Baer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great clubs. I have seen my golf game improve drastically with more instruction, practice and these clubs.
customer_reviews.author: David Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you are a beginner or new to golf ...
customer_reviews.text: A very good kit for beginners. The driver is not the greatest but all other irons and woods are very decent for the beginners. The hybrid is the best in the lot and I love using it for all occasions where I can bring it out. These lasts for a long they are sturdy and don't need to be worried about the abuse with the beginner skills
customer_reviews.author: invincible

customer_reviews.title: You won’t see him anymore.
customer_reviews.text: The clubs are used by my husband. He uses them three days a week. He has said they have made a difference be in his golf game.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Hakiel

customer_reviews.title: Good beginners set
customer_reviews.text: Relearning the game and this was a good choice. Not to expensive for all you get and everything was decent quality. Will eventually get a better driver though in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for the casual golfer
customer_reviews.text: bought these as gift, my brother goes golfing 5-8 times a year, he's no league player or weekend warrior and he loves these clubs. i hit all of them with him at the driving range and they did great. bag is nice also. good beginner to casual player set.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe_Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect for Me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner at only 23 years old, and I love this set. Its the best quality set I could find for around $150. Taken to the driving range a few times and they are working good for me. Nice putter is included. The golf bag is mediocre quality, but I could care less about that. I would def recommend this set to any beginner.
customer_reviews.author: tmar

customer_reviews.title: ... a beginner in golf hence this set has been perfect to me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner in golf hence this set has been perfect to me. All my "experts" friends said I have to buy a Big brand set clubs, but if your are new in golfing you don't want spend thousand of dollars only to know if you like it therefore this set is really affordable for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Gonzalez Cuesta

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke after first round of walking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this golf set to get back into the game after not playing for 5 years. The clubs themselves are fine and well-priced. However, the bag is what I take issue with when it comes to this set. I used the clubs on 3 separate occasions at the driving range and once during a carted round of 9. However, I took the clubs out for my first round of 9 walking and before I could get to the 6th tee, the middle plastic portion of the shoulder strap had snapped/broken. This to me screams cheap production and I just hope that the clubs hold up better over time than the bag did. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great value for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome especially for the casual golfer who's trying to do enough not to look foolish of the the course when he's entertaining potential clients. Has everything you need for the driving range and the bag is super cool. Great value for the price. You will not regret.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: really nice clubs at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous reviews on every site, I felt these clubs Were the best choice for the money. I am completely satisfied with my purchase. - the bag is really nice, light weight. Love it. - the driver, after a few swings, getting great yardage on the green. - the irons, I feel are the best part of this package. great quality, you won't be disappointed - 3 wood/ hybrid, never played with these before so I'm not used to them yet. If you're looking for a great starter set, this is it
customer_reviews.author: Steven t

customer_reviews.title: Very good set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: Very good set of clubs. I haven't played an actual round yet, but I've been to the driving range with them a couple of times. So far so good. Now I just need lessons and to work on my swing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beginners set
customer_reviews.text: I decided to pick up golf again after trying my hand at it over a decade ago. These clubs are nice. I haven’t played a round yet, but have taken several lessons and gone to the driving range. They have held up so far and for the price, you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few trips to the driving range to get consistent with these clubs, buts that is probably more due to the fact that I have never really golfed that much. The clubs look great and the added bag was a plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Will G

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of clubs arrived right on time good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised of the quality of this set for the price. This sixteen piece should be adequate fro beginner or intermediate players. I really can not find anything to criticize.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product has higher quality than I thought. I was kind of worry when I order it. I read most reviews and decide to buy it. It has all the pieces that I need. The bag is very nice also. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time reviewing anything on just about any of my online purchases; however, I feel like this will give a buyer comfort with an expensive purchase. They're everything and more I expected from a below $200 club set. They're amazing for beginners. I can't really speak on the issues I've seen about buyers requesting a left hand set or a female set, for I am the complete opposite of the two. But if you are a right handed male, fear not, this is a good beginner/intermediate set. 5 STARS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I just recently picked up the game of golf and I suck; so I can't tell you if these clubs will improve your game or not - but they look pretty and they let me hit the ball... so I will say they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ImYourHuckleberry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used these at the Driving Range and on the course. No problems with them and work as expected
customer_reviews.author: alan winters

customer_reviews.title: Great set for beginners to intermediates.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for beginners and intermediates.. the only thing that i cant find to figure out is the driver but that can then again be the way i swing... i need less degrees or it might be a bit short for me. Also the bag doesnt look to fancy but who cares? If it bothers you when you get then buy another one used! My recommendation of the beginner/intermediate sets out there is to get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Carl W

customer_reviews.title: Fast as hell!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a casual golf player......yet. But with these clubs I'm going to start getting out there with a few of my friends and have some fun. These clubs feel nice and sturdy and the bag looks great. I ordered these clubs at 11am on monday and they were on my doorstep by 2pm on Tuesday. They shipped AMAZINGLY fast and were not damaged which is a big plus. Can't wait to go out and practice my swing with these bad boys!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great Clubs
customer_reviews.text: I just got these clubs in the mail and when I opened them I was impressed. Everything looked good and they were protected well. I went to the range today and the driver was surprisingly light and I hit it nice and straight. The irons were nice to but I'm not as good with them but they still hit well. The only minor problem is the 3 wood is a little flexible kind of like a women's club but it still hits nicely. Perfect for a begineer like myself and even for intermediate players.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Quality made set, more clubs than most, just getting back into golfing, and I notice how lightweight these are compared to my old circa 1970's clubs were. Thanks for such a great price Pinemeadow!
customer_reviews.author: Citynerd

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product !!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner golfer and although I love the sport I still haven't been able to golf as much as I want to; however, when I do, this set of Pinemeadow's are great and make the sport very enjoyable for me. You will need to get your own set of wedges, probably a '56, '58 and I also got a '68 just for the luxury of having it. Also pinemeadows and work great out there. Highly recommend this set!!
customer_reviews.author: Israel

customer_reviews.title: Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent relatively inexpensive golf clubs for the novice golfer. Excellent weight with almost no club vibration to the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Martin T. J. Hilger

customer_reviews.title: Good golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: Thid pinemeadow golf clubs are really nice, they get to my home in the exact amount of time. The irons and woods are as I spect them to be, the set also have a putter with big arrow that helps you to align the ball with the hole. I like the 440cc driver but I was expecting it to be 460cc; it also comes with a nice ligh weight bag that you can carry like a back pack. I recommend this set to any beginner who wnat to improve their game. Its a nice 16 set of clubs!!
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: Pinemeadow golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the money. Bought for son to play high school golf. This set has everything and more for a beginner. Amazon price well below companies webpage, with free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Sonie

customer_reviews.title: but they seem to be fine. Now I need to see how they do ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent clubs for the price. I was worried about the size for me i'm 6'-2", but they seem to be fine. Now I need to see how they do on the course
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: First full set for my teen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great first set for the teen stepping into their first full men's set. The thicker heads (as compared to a name brand set like ping) is great for learning to hit the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Clubs for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I recently took up golf and was looking for cheap but good clubs and I came across these. They feel great when you swing, I love them! I do wish the bag had a better place for me to hang my towel and glove so I don't have to put them in one of the 4 pockets. Other than that, they are all around great clubs for a great price and I would recommend them to anyone beginning golf!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Stamper

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The entire set is wonderful. The clubs are a nice set for me to begin my golf career with and the stand bag with backpack straps is a huge step up from having to sling on strap over a shoulder. My only complaint would be a couple of the plastic clips on the shoulder straps broke within the first few times of carrying the bag 9 holes. Upon contacting the manufacturer and providing them pictures of the broken clips, they sent me replacement clips right away. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. 1st time I went to range the 3w ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. 1st time I went to range the 3w broke. A few swings and done. Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lets be honest
customer_reviews.text: With a price like this you can't go wrong.. Esp like me who is new to the game these are more than acceptable. Bag is alittle cheap feeling but you'll get over it. Trust me its a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT beginner set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an impulse golfing outing. I learned to play for the first time and this set helped me keep up with my instructor! Great choicE!
customer_reviews.author: Carson Zone

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Looked all over for a nice set of clubs that didn't break the bank. My husband loves them. He has a friend trying them out and if he likes them, he's going to order a set. We looked in all the "sport" stores and couldn't find anything as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a friend of mine. He just started golfing! Loves them. Good quality in the irons. Decent quality woods. Cheap putter. But for the price...you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Beginner Set
customer_reviews.text: I got this off a lightning deal and I loved it. I got it for my son who is new to golf. It works great and it cheaper for a beginner because it has essentially all the club he needs.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Nice backup set to have handy!
customer_reviews.text: Decent second set of clubs to have in the trunk in case a grudge match breaks out or friends show up!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B from ND

customer_reviews.title: fantastic...
customer_reviews.text: the bag can be better, but the golf club is very good.. only need the sand wedge and the chip
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Peña Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: but I've been very satisfied with these clubs
customer_reviews.text: This is my first year playing golf, but I've been very satisfied with these clubs.
customer_reviews.author: michael opalko

customer_reviews.title: Complete set for begginers..!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great resistance. Great for begginers and for practice days. The only iron you needs to buy is the sand wedge and the set is really complete.
customer_reviews.author: Wirlow06

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend absolutely loves these - avid recreational golfer. All his friends are jealous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: I am brand new to golf and I think this is a great starter set. It comes with pretty much everything you need to get out and play fairly competitively, and comes at a great price. I'm sure I'll get a different set of clubs in the future, but I am completely satisfied with this set for now. I definitely recommend for the beginning golfer.
customer_reviews.author: twarriorh21

customer_reviews.title: Golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item. Came to my house very quickly and seems to be good quality. Have not used yet....we still have snow on the ground!!
customer_reviews.author: HARRY

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great starter set for me so far
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great starter set for me so far. I have had it for a few months. Seems like you get very good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: NorCal_7777

customer_reviews.title: great starter set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband...his old clubs had wooden drivers so we figured it was time for an upgrade. He's a beginner golfer, and these were perfect. The set had a rain cover and coveres for all of this woods. Plus the bag has a kickstand. His favorite feature of the set is the hybrid 3 (it does not come with a 3 iron) that he uses a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Racheal W

customer_reviews.title: As a new golfer the clubs are great. however
customer_reviews.text: As a new golfer the clubs are great. however, the bag broke on the second use, luckily my friend had an extra. I was hoping the bad reviews I saw prior to purchasing were flukes, now I am quite certain the bag is a POS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: For a beginner set you can't go wrong with these. The driver is really loose but that is just how the club is made. Bought these clubs a couple months ago and the only destruction they have seen is that the seems on the bag are starting to rip from bouncing around in the cart. The clubs themselves are exactly what you need in a first set. No complaints on performance.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Gerke

customer_reviews.title: Great Clubs
customer_reviews.text: With Prime the clubs arrived in less than two days, brand new and packaged wonderfully. The clubs worked great the first time out and I look forward to using them more!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Shields

customer_reviews.title: Id buy it again
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my buddy and his game got better immediately. great value, perfect starter set that looks great and plays fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs with an decent bag
customer_reviews.text: The golf clubs in this set are amazing. The grips are great and they have a great feeling when you hit the ball. The only bad side to the set is the bag. I have to carry my golf clubs the entire coarse and after the second full day out the plastic strap adjusters snapped and now I can't carry the bag without ruining my shoulder. But all in all the clubs are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Collin106

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Im starting at golf, this worked perfect for starting. Ive been playing for a month and they are working perfectly. Y truly commend them if you want to start slow on budget.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Cherem

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: You will not be disappointed in this set. Great value for a hack golfer that wants a set of clubs, but doesn't care about brand names.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kintner

customer_reviews.title: A great complete set for a BEGINNER
customer_reviews.text: A great complete set for a BEGINNER. The driver sucks but what do you expect. You get what you pay for. I plan on adding the 55-60 wedges. I will upgrade the driver later when I have the monies. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lui

customer_reviews.title: Good set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I just started playing golf and after reading all the reviews decided to buy this set and I haven't been disappointed. My instructor says I got a fantastic deal and that it should serve me well for the next few years
customer_reviews.author: Doren

customer_reviews.title: Irons play well and I find myself putting better. I'm still getting acclimated with the hybrid club
customer_reviews.text: I'm a golfer who is starting to spend more time in golf. I felt these clubs were a solid starter set and so far they have been. Irons play well and I find myself putting better. I'm still getting acclimated with the hybrid club, but with time this will become easier.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Clubs work great, and are surprisingly well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Long and Straight
customer_reviews.text: The price and the bag and the golf clubs was all as advertised. This is winter up here in Ohio, but I have taken the golf clubs to driving ranges two times and I am hitting the clubs long and straight. The is exellencent for a "hacker" like me.
customer_reviews.author: rlk48

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner golfer, these were my first set of clubs and so far, I have no complaints whatsoever. My friend is a long time golfer and he said the clubs seem very good, especially the putter which totally impresses him. I read the reviews before buying my clubs, some of which were very negative but like I said, they seem like a nice, well made set to me. Hopefully, a year or two from now, I'll be saying the same thing. I honestly don't see how a very costly set could perform any better then these for me. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RJM

customer_reviews.title: it was a birthday present
customer_reviews.text: I never saw the item. But my son loved it. I don't know much about golfing, but I was surprised to find it on Amazon.com. It was a great gift idea. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bella

customer_reviews.title: Ok golf set
customer_reviews.text: The golf set is ok, nothing fancy. Personally I use a different driver than the one it came with but the irons are good to use.
customer_reviews.author: jleudy

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Set
customer_reviews.text: Being a Beginner to the game of golf, this set is great. It has all of the essential Irons and woods, and is pretty durable as well. My only complaint is that the strap did break on me, and I kinda had to rig it with some Duck tape to fix it. Besides that, the set is very good, looks nice, and plays pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Good clubs and value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this golf set to replace my old one. First I received it, it was packaged well and no damaged parts. And I have not got chance to play with it. But the clubs materials are good and feel very comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Weining Chen

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: im a beginner player and these clubs are made perfect for me.the price is very good for the quality and performance they have.
customer_reviews.author: NIco Posada

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to replace a hand me down set he had. Very nice looking. He loves it and has used it 5 days a week for last several weeks with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Schuller

customer_reviews.title: PINEMEADOW 16 PIECE GOLF SET
customer_reviews.text: GREAT STARTER SET I HAVE ALREADY ADDED MORE WEDGES, AND A CHIPPER TO THE SET I AM VERY PLEASED WITH THE SET
customer_reviews.author: crossley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This set of clubs was a phenomenal purchase at an even better price. Since buying the club and finding the deal on my Iphone app, iSlick, I have been to the range multiple times and I must say, I have NOT been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dfernancr

customer_reviews.title: A nice set of golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: The golf clubs are great for someone who views golf as a hobby and likes to play occasionally for recreation
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Great golf set!
customer_reviews.text: I got this set as entry level golfer and am very happy with it, i really like the irons, they are weighted well and very forgiving. I have been to the range about 10 times with these clubs and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. I was able to size them to me and they're great ! Bag could be more durable , cheap straps.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set!
customer_reviews.text: Been a real casual golfer for 15 years or so and looking to start playing with more regularity. I have been to the driving range a few times and can't say enough about these clubs for a hack like me. I am whacking balls left and right like nobody's business!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice set for starter!
customer_reviews.text: The set came in with everything advertised. The finish on the club is clean and neat, the red and black color combination looks fantastic. I bought this set as my first club set and I am really satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelL

customer_reviews.title: 5 star seller
customer_reviews.text: I had an unusual issue in that I was shipped this set with 2 x 8 irons and no pitching wedge. I contacted Pinemeadow who responded the next day, apologized for the mix up and shipped me the missing PW club right away for no extra charge. They were an absolute pleasure to deal with. As a social golfer, I'm really enjoying this set of clubs and have already recommended them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set at wonderful price
customer_reviews.text: I feel this set is a great value and provides everything a beginner to intermediate golfer really needs!I love the hybrid in there and the driver is of very good quality. Can't go wrong with that mallet style putter either!
customer_reviews.author: Potholer Extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: Good set of clubs for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just used them today. They feel solid and I don't have anything bad to say about them. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work good. Use them all the time during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs all I needed to add was a Sand wedge and you're good to go! Great quality and feel and the price point is unmatched highly recommended buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alvin M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. I am over 6 feet and a woman and these clubs fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Blanchar

product_meta.title: Pinemeadow PRE Men's 16-Piece Complete Golf Set
product_meta.description:
AMAZON.COM


PINEMEADOW PRE 16-PIECE COMPLETE GOLF SET
Hit the course with confidence with the Pinemeadow Pre 16-piece complete golf set, which includes everything you need for a day on the links. The Pre Set starts with a titanium-enhanced 10.5-degree driver with a controlled-launch graphite shaft. The driver is engineered for maximum distance and power, helping you make short work of par 4s and 5s. The middle distances are covered by the fairway wood and hybrid. The wood includes a graphite shaft and a low-profile 15-degree head to create better shots from the fairway and rough. The hybrid is even more versatile, with a premium steel shaft and a 21-degree head that excels when hitting from any type of lie. The driver, 3-wood, and 3-hybrid come with custom head covers.

The set also includes a full range of stainless-steel irons (4 through 9 and pitching wedge)--each with perimeter-weighted heads, a wide cavity back design, an oversized sweet spot, and a tour-style grip. And once you've reached the green, you can pull out the Pre mallet putter, which is weighted for an improved feel and response. The putter allows you to align the ball precisely each time, giving you the confidence to make important putts. To complete the set, Pinemeadow added a lightweight dual-strap carrying bag with an integrated kickstand and rain hood.

DRIVER: Titanium enhanced 10.5 degree driver engineered for maximum distance and power. Equipped with a controlled launch graphite shaft and custom head cover included.

3 FAIRWAY WOOD: 15 Degree fairway wood with graphite shaft and low profile head design for better shots from the fairway and rough. Graphite shaft and custom head cover included.

3 HYBRID: The 21-degree hybrid provides a versatile option from any type of lie for improved play. Equipped with a premium steel shaft and custom head cover.

IRONS: The 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 and PW stainless steel irons are designed with perimeter weighted heads, wide cavity back design, and an oversized sweet spot. Irons are built with premium steel shafts and tour style grips.

PUTTER: The Pre Mallet putter is weighted for improved feel and response. This putter allows you to align the ball right each time and gives you greater confidence to make important putts.

STAND BAG: Lightweight dual strap carry bag with integrated kick stand and rain hood.

 SPECIFICATIONS: 
 * 10.5° Driver
 * 15° 3 wood
 * 21° 3 Hybrid
 * 4-PW Irons
 * Pre Putter
 * Dual Strap Stand Bag
 * Driver, 3 wood and hybrid comes with headcovers
feature_bullets: One 16-piece complete golf set with clubs and stand bag
Stainless-steel 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and pitching wedge irons; pre mallet putter
Dual-strap carrying bag with integrated kick stand
